-dvai rA#jaqsUya#sya rUqpaM ~Mya EqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqgniM ci#nuqta uqBAvEqva lOqkAvaqBi ja#yatiq yaSca# rAjaqsUyE#nEjAqnasyaq yaScA$gniqcitaq indra#sya suShuvAqNasya# daSaqdhEndriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M parA#&pataqt taddEqvAH sau$trAmaqNyA sama#Baranth sUqyatEq vA EqSha yO$&gniM ci#nuqtE$&gniM ciqtvA sau$trAmaqNyA ya#jEtEndriqyamEqva vIqrya(gm)# saqBRuMtyAq&&*tman dha#ttE || 14
(ta EqvA - nvava#srAvayatyEq - ta - daqShTAca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A3)
